articles.description: The PS5 and PS5 Pro ports of Indiana Jones and the Great Circle lack much in the way of new features - but the game is still golden.
articles.content: As one of the major titles to emerge from Microsoft's acquisition of Bethesda, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle proved a critical hit on Xbox Series X, S and PC in late 2024 - and now, four months … [+9210 chars]
